WaterWreckage.name: Water Wreckage
WaterWreckage.description:
You look around and notice you are in the water in boat wreckage,
you look down and notice you were floating on a sign, it says Larson's discount boat tours."

looking.east: nothing,but Water for as far as the eyes can see
looking.south: nothing,but Water for as far as the eyes can see
looking.north: You look off in a distance and notice a island with a large structure on it
looking.west: nothing,but Water for as far as the eyes can see

Beach.name: Beach
Beach.description:
You are on the beach, feel the sand burning your feet,
there is a boat dock east and Hospital entrance north.
Beach.story: You hear faint screams coming from the north thats in the the hospital

Boat.name: Boat
Boat.description: You walk into a loading dock and see a boat. On the boat is a sign that says 'if needed please use keys are are in hospital'

Lobby.name: Lobby
Lobby.description: You are in the dark lobby of the hospital. with a dim light east of room. You see a dimmly lit pepsimachine in the corner
Lobby.story: Screams seem to be coming form very back room of the hospital

looking.east: You see worn furniture and an information stand and a dimly lit pepsimachine!
looking.south: look out doors to see beach

NorthHallway.name: NorthHallway
NorthHallway.description: You are walking down a long dirty hallway, you hear muffled voices in a distance.
NorthHallway.story: Screams are getting louder, it sounds like Larson

NorthHall2.name: NorthHall2
NorthHall2.description: You are in North Hallway 2, and you here voice coming from a unknown location.
NorthHall2.story: Screams are coming from next room, its definetly  Larson

looking.north: See a Room labeled Doctor's Office

WestHallway.name: WestHallway
WestHallway.description: You are in the West Hallway. West has a sign marked Waiting Room.

WaitingRoom.name: WaitingRoom
WaitingRoom.description:
You see a bunch of chairs scattered across the room, 
there is one upright chair in the center, with a sign that says I made it to an SDE and so can you. 
Right below the sign is the boat key.

DoctorsOffice.name: DoctorsOffice
DoctorsOffice.story:
Everybody is panicking. You hear Larson say in confusion 
“Where is my Code. 
My environment does not work, help a brother out.” 
Doctors look at you and ask, “Are you an SDE? 
Doc says his Junit is not imported and there are red lines everywhere.
There seems to be an error on line 14 Pepsi is not defined.
Can you help? We are only doctors and understand human issues.”
